text: Which of the following is/are true? A. If two events A and B are disjoint, they must also be independent. B. If two events A and B are collectively exhaustive then P(A) + P(B) = 1. C. If two events A and B are collectively exhaustive then P(A U B) = 1. D. If two evens A and B are independent, then A° and B° are also independent.
